DepositAccount.description: Base type for all financial accounts

id.description: The global identifier for this item

accountType.description: Discriminator property set to the specific type of account by name (e.g., DepositAccount)

auditInfo.description: Defines standard system audit fields available for most types

createdDate.description: Timestamp of when the entity was created

createdBy.description: Identifies the system or user which created the entity

updatedDate.description: Timestamp of when the entity was last updated

updatedBy.description: Identifies the system or user which last updated the entity

isDeleted.description: Indicates whether or not the entity has been soft-deleted

auditInfo.description: Defines standard system audit fields available for most types

updatedBy.description: Identifies the system or user which last updated the entity

isDeleted.description: Indicates whether or not the entity has been soft-deleted

anyOf.description: Defines a structure for referencing an entity in external systems

externalId.description: A unique identifier assigned to an entity in another system

externalIdType.description: Identifies the system that owns or otherwise recognizes this unique identifier

anyOf.description: Identifies the external system that owns or otherwise recognizes a particular identifier

status.description: Indicates whether this identifier is currently valid or not

statusLastChangedOn.description: Date and time of the last change in status

createdDate.description: Timestamp of when the entity was created

createdBy.description: Identifies the system or user which created the entity

updatedDate.description: Timestamp of when the entity was last updated

isDeleted.description: Indicates whether or not the entity has been soft-deleted

institutionId.description: Optional reference to the financial institution this account is held at

accountBalance.description: Current credit (positive) or debit (negative) balance of the account

availableBalance.description: Amount of funds (or credit) available for withdrawal

accountLabel.description: A customer-provided nickname for the account

taxIdentificationNumber.description: Government tax identifier (e.g., SSN or SIN) of the primary account owner

lastTransactionDate.description: Date a transaction was last recorded for this account

lastTransactionType.description: References the type of transaction last recorded for this account

lastTransactionAmount.description: Amount of the last transaction recorded for this account

lastStatementDate.description: Date the last statement was produced for this account

notes.description: Free-form notes recorded for this account

externalIds.description: External identifiers for this account (e.g., Salesforce, MDM, etc.)

items.description: Defines a structure for referencing an entity in external systems

externalId.description: A unique identifier assigned to an entity in another system

externalIdType.description: Identifies the system that owns or otherwise recognizes this unique identifier

anyOf.description: Identifies the external system that owns or otherwise recognizes a particular identifier

status.description: Indicates whether this identifier is currently valid or not

statusLastChangedDate.description: Date and time of the last change in status

auditInfo.description: Defines standard system audit fields available for most types

createdDate.description: Timestamp of when the entity was created

createdBy.description: Identifies the system or user which created the entity

updatedDate.description: Timestamp of when the entity was last updated

updatedBy.description: Identifies the system or user which last updated the entity

isDeleted.description: Indicates whether or not the entity has been soft-deleted

routingNumber.description: Branch or routing number for the account

overdraftLimit.description: Indicates the maximum deficit in an account; a value of 0.0 means no overdraft is allowed

minimumBalance.description: The minimum amount that must be held in a Money Market account

dailyWithdrawalLimit.description: Maximum amount that can be withdrawn directly from this account per day

monthlyWithdrawalLimit.description: Maximum amount that can be withdrawn directly from this account per month

maximumMonthlyWithdrawals.description: The maximum number of withdrawals allowed per month

lastDepositDate.description: Date the last deposit was made on

lastWithdrawalDate.description: Date the last withdrawal was made on
